product_name: Eider Target Knit Shell Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: A stretchy, ultralight waterproof shell for summer, the men's Eider Target Knit Shell Rain Jacket with GORE-TEX(R) has a heathered face for a unique aesthetic. Made of waterproof, windproof and breathable GORE-TEX Active Knit Cloudy Stretch polyester. Fully seam sealed; waterproof zippers on chest pocket and front. Hood has spandex binding and elastic drawcord. Thumbholes in cuffs extend hand coverage. Eider Target Knit Shell Rain Jacket for men has an elastic hem that snugs warmth in, weather out. Slim, athletic fit.
short_description: A stretchy, ultralight waterproof shell for summer, the men's Eider Target Knit Shell Rain Jacket with GORE-TEX(R) has a heathered face for a unique aesthetic.
